summary: Comprehensive testing of CS 1.6 Server Hub website completed. Backend APIs are 96% functional with only minor notifications issue. Frontend UI is fully functional with excellent user experience and all core features working properly.
passed_tests: Home page loads with server status and top players
Server Status page shows live data from CS 1.6 server
Admin login working with Stylish/Itachi1849 credentials
Admin panel accessible with all tabs functional
Apply for Admin form submission works
All API endpoints working except notifications
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix notifications endpoint (/api/notifications) which is returning 520 Internal Server Error. This is a minor issue and doesn't affect core functionality.
